#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<utility>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
class cmp
{
public:
    cmp() {}
    bool operator() (long long &x, long long &y)
    {
        return x > y;
    }
};
priority_queue < int, vector < long long > , cmp > PQ;
int main()
{
    //freopen("data.txt", "r", stdin);
    long long t,T;
    long long N,K,x,k,s;
    long long ans;
    scanf("%lld", &T);
    for (t=1; t<=T; ++t)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld", &N, &K);
        while(!PQ.empty()) PQ.pop();
        x = (N-1) % (K-1);
        x = (K-1 - x) % (K-1);
        while(x--) PQ.push(0);
        while(N--)
        {
            scanf("%lld", &x);
            PQ.push(x);
        }
        ans = 0;
        while(PQ.size() > 1)
        {
            k = K, s = 0;
            while(k--)
            {
                x = PQ.top();
                //printf("%lld ", x);
                PQ.pop();
                s += x;
            }
            //puts("");
            ans += s;
            PQ.push(s);
        }
        printf("Case %lld: %lld\n", t, ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
